item.title: Barbie (2023) Review
item.description: My letterboxd review : Might contain minor spoilers of sort. Glorious. Gorgeous. Greta is a genius. I LOVED the movie. But before I start talking about the movie I want to say this.

item.title: Cinema as mass media
item.description: Documentary vs Feature Film Movements in Cinema History Italian Neorealism filmmakers could implement honest portrayals of life on the big screen.

item.title: A Portrait of The Artist as a Young Man
item.description: This is a movie based on the novel. A pale, boring 90 minute distillation of 299 pages. Something a 10 minute summary does a better job of.
